document.full_text: portugal's caretaker government said on wednesday it had decided to seek financing from the european union in an abrupt turnaround after resisting a bailout for months despite sharply deteriorating financial conditions.
document.title: in u-turn, portugal requests eu financial aid
lines_and_colors: portugal's caretaker government said on wednesday it had decided to seek financing from the european union in an abrupt turnaround after resisting a bailout for months despite sharply deteriorating financial conditions.
